subject: Re: [junit] What is the solution to test web services?
msgSnippet: Hello!!! I reallu do not undesrstand by what do u mean by webservice, but in case you mean webapplication, u can use HTTPUNIT to test the webapplication. ...
messageBody:
Hello!!!
I reallu do not undesrstand by what do u mean by
webservice, but in case you mean webapplication, u can
use HTTPUNIT to test the webapplication.
--- Jirong Hu <hujirong888@...> wrote:

>
>
> Hi
>
> I have used JUnit to test J2EE applications, but
> never got a chance
> to code web services.
>
> How do you test web services, both for unit test and
> integration
> test?
>
> Jirong
>
>
>
>
>
>
>

Harbir singh Hundal
